name: Sir Ursas

trait.name: Special Equipment
text: Sir Ursas wears a ring of mind shielding and plate armor of fire resistance.

trait.name: Brave
text: Sir Ursas has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Brute
text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Sir Ursas hits with it (included in his attack).

action.name: Multiattack
text: Sir Ursas makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shield Bash
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reaction.name: Parry
text: Sir Ursas adds 3 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, he must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description:
Out on Loan. 
------
The powerful relics possessed by Lynx Creatlach and Sir Ursas (see the "Special Equipment" section of their stat blocks) have been granted to them by their diabolical masters, and are not meant to be claimed as treasure. If either agent is killed in the course of the adventure, their special equipment vanishes, returning to Bel or Zariel.
------
Source: Infernal Machine Rebuild p. 56
